short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Mirroring, Speed Control, and Segment looping to help you learn dance choreographies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summary 📝
This extension allows you to mirror videos, control playback speed (0.1 - 3.0), and mark up videos to loop. This is helpful in a variety of fields such as sewing, drawing, and especially dance! 💃🕺

To use it simply click the extension at the top right on any YouTube video!

Features 😸
✅Mirror Mode
✅Speed Control
✅Segmentation
✅Video-Based Storage

Guide
Flip
Simply press the flip switch to mirror the video!

Speed
Manually input the speed into the text box OR click on the timeline bar!

Segment Loops
Clicking on the extension puts a marker icon into the youtube player.
Clicking this icon creates a marker at the current timestamp of the video. 
You can select two markers to define the current practicing segment which will loop once you reach the end.
By Creating up to 6 markers, you can cut up a dance and modularly improve on any segment that needs work!

🔒This extension does not collect any personal or identifying information.


Usage FYI
1. If the buttons are not working, try reloading the webpage. ♻️
2. Saved properties are applied when clicking the extension popup at the top right. 👆
